nodes.text: The Golden Slug was a run-down hotel with a sleazy bar in the lobby. It was located in a dead-end street just off a main thoroughfare of the Coruscant underworld. The place was a mess with debris on the floor, broken furniture, and the sign featured two broken letters due to a drunken melee that had occurred in the establishment.
Prior to the Battle of Praesitlyn, Nejaa Halcyon and Anakin Skywalker traveled there to visit Grudo.
